00033 class KviWindow;
00034 class KviKvsModuleInterface;
00035 class KviKvsVariantList;

00037 #define KVI_KVS_NUM_RAW_EVENTS 1000
00038 
00039 class KVIRC_API KviKvsEventManager
00040 {
00041         friend class KviModule; // compatibility only!
00042 protected: // it only can be created and destroyed by KviKvsAliasManager::init()/done()
00043         KviKvsEventManager();
00044         ~KviKvsEventManager();
00045 protected:
00046         static KviKvsEventManager * m_pInstance;
00047 
00048         static KviKvsEvent               m_appEventTable[KVI_KVS_NUM_APP_EVENTS];
00049         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * m_rawEventTable[KVI_KVS_NUM_RAW_EVENTS];
00050 public:
00051         static KviKvsEventManager * instance(){ return m_pInstance; };
00052         static void init(); // called by KviKvs::init()
00053         static void done(); // called by KviKvs::done()
00054 
00055         KviKvsEvent * appEvent(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return &(m_appEventTable[uEvIdx]); };
00056 
00057         bool hasAppHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].hasHandlers(); };
00058         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * appHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].handlers(); };
00059 
00060         bool hasRawHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_rawEventTable[uEvIdx]; };
00061         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * rawHandlers(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return m_rawEventTable[uEvIdx]; };
00062 
00063         KviKvsEvent * findAppEventByName(const QString &szName);
00064         unsigned int findAppEventIndexByName(const QString &szName);
00065         bool isValidAppEvent(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return (uEvIdx < KVI_KVS_NUM_APP_EVENTS); };
00066 
00067         bool isValidRawEvent(unsigned int uEvIdx){ return (uEvIdx < KVI_KVS_NUM_RAW_EVENTS); };
00068 
00069         bool addAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviKvsEventHandler * h);
00070         bool addRawHandler(unsigned int uRawIdx,KviKvsEventHandler * h);
00071 
00072         bool removeScriptAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00073         bool removeScriptRawHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00074 
00075         bool enableScriptAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName,bool bEnable);
00076         bool enableScriptRawHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName,bool bEnable);
00077 
00078         bool removeModuleAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00079         bool removeModuleRawHandler(unsigned int uRawIdx,KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00080 
00081         void removeAllModuleAppHandlers(KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00082         void removeAllModuleRawHandlers(KviKvsModuleInterface *i);
00083 
00084         void removeAllModuleHandlers(KviKvsModuleInterface * i);
00085 
00086         KviKvsScriptEventHandler * findScriptRawHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00087         KviKvsScriptEventHandler * findScriptAppHandler(unsigned int uEvIdx,const QString &szName);
00088 
00089         // returns true if further processing should be stopped
00090         // none of these functions takes params ownership, so be sure to delete them !
00091         bool triggerHandlers(KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * pHandlers,KviWindow *pWnd,KviKvsVariantList *pParams);
00092         bool trigger(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviWindow * pWnd,KviKvsVariantList * pParams)
00093                 { return triggerHandlers(m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].handlers(),pWnd,pParams); };
00094         bool triggerRaw(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviWindow *pWnd,KviKvsVariantList * pParams)
00095                 { return triggerHandlers(m_rawEventTable[uEvIdx],pWnd,pParams); };
00096 
00097         // this is the only that takes parameter ownership and deletes them
00098         bool triggerDeleteParams(unsigned int uEvIdx,KviWindow * pWnd,KviKvsVariantList * pParams)
00099         {
00100                 bool bRet = triggerHandlers(m_appEventTable[uEvIdx].handlers(),pWnd,pParams);
00101                 delete pParams;
00102                 return bRet;
00103         };
00104 
00105         void removeAllScriptAppHandlers();
00106         void removeAllScriptRawHandlers();
00107 
00108         void clearAppEvents();
00109         void clearRawEvents();
00110         void clear();
00111 
00112         void loadAppEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00113         void saveAppEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00114         void loadRawEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00115         void saveRawEvents(const QString &szFileName);
00116 };
